restaurants.name: Pizza Palace
restaurants.description: Delicious wood-fired pizzas loved across Maseru. Perfect for family and friends!

restaurants.name: Burger Joint
restaurants.description: Juicy, locally-sourced beef burgers with freshly made sides. A taste you can't resist!

restaurants.name: Sushi Spot
restaurants.description: Fresh, premium sushi rolls prepared daily. Experience Japanese flavors in Maseru!

restaurants.name: Mama's Kitchen
restaurants.description: Authentic Sesotho cuisine with homemade stews, pap, and local delicacies. Comfort food at its best!

restaurants.name: Chill & Grill
restaurants.description: Perfect spot for grilled meats, peri-peri chicken, and refreshing drinks. Ideal for casual dining!
